author: Staff Reporter
text:
Department of Coastal Aquaculture, Tharuvaikulam, will offer a one-day free training in shrimp farming at Tharuvaikulam on February 19, according to a statement.

Interested candidates should register their names on or before February 18 until 5 p.m. Registration could be done with Professor and Head, Department of Coastal Aquaculture, FCRI, Tharuvaikulam -628105. Further details can be had from 09442288850.
title: Free training
